scripts.truncate:presse-locale: ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=accept-new -i ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 root@62.171.186.233 'cd /opt/presseLocale-backend && docker compose exec -T presseLocale-backend node scripts/truncate-presse-locale.js'
scripts.cypress:presse-locale: npm run truncate:presse-locale && npm run cypress:run -- --spec "cypress/e2e/presseLocaleCreateOption1.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleCreateOption2.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleCreateOption3.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleCreateOption4.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleDeleteOption1.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleDeleteOption2.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleDeleteOption3.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleDeleteOption4.cy.js"
scripts.cypress:presse-locale:docker: npm run truncate:presse-locale && docker run --rm -v "$(pwd):/e2e" -w /e2e --entrypoint cypress cypress/included:13.6.0 run --spec "cypress/e2e/presseLocaleCreateOption1.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleCreateOption2.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleCreateOption3.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleCreateOption4.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleDeleteOption1.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleDeleteOption2.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleDeleteOption3.cy.js,cypress/e2e/presseLocaleDeleteOption4.cy.js"
